description: Fast image-to-video generation model that animates static images with motion based on text prompts

image_url.description: URL of the input image. If the input image does not match the chosen aspect ratio, it is resized and center cropped

prompt.description: The text prompt to guide video generation and animation
prompt.placeholder: The character moves slowly, eyes full of determination...

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio of the generated video. If 'auto', the aspect ratio will be determined automatically based on the input image

seed.description: Random seed for reproducibility. If None, a random seed is chosen

enable_safety_checker.description: If set to true, input data will be checked for safety before processing

enable_prompt_expansion.description: Whether to enable prompt expansion using a large language model

prompt_details.style_guide: Focus on describing the motion and animation you want to see in the static image
best_practices: Mention facial expressions and body language changes
Use motion-related verbs and descriptive language

prompt_structure.subject_motion: Describe how the main subject should move
prompt_structure.timing_pacing: Describe the speed and rhythm of movements
prompt_structure.emotional_tone: Convey the mood and feeling of the animation

example_prompts.title: Character Animation
example_prompts.prompt: The white dragon warrior stands still, eyes full of determination and strength. The camera slowly moves closer or circles around the warrior, highlighting the powerful presence and heroic spirit of the character.

example_prompts.title: Nature Scene Animation
example_prompts.prompt: Gentle wind blows through the trees, leaves rustling softly. The camera slowly pans across the landscape while clouds drift peacefully in the sky.

request.prompt: The person blinks slowly and smiles gently

example_requests.title: Landscape Animation
example_requests.description: Animate a landscape photo with environmental effects

request.prompt: Clouds move slowly across the sky, water ripples gently, and grass sways in the breeze

url.description: URL where the video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the video file

file_size.description: Size of the video file in bytes

prompt.description: The text prompt used for video generation

usage_tips: Use high-quality input images for best results
Describe specific motions rather than general animations
Consider the aspect ratio of your input image
Use 'auto' aspect ratio to preserve original image proportions
Enable prompt expansion for more detailed motion descriptions
limitations: Input image quality affects output video quality
Complex motions may not be accurately represented
Safety checker may filter inappropriate content
Image will be resized and cropped if aspect ratio doesn't match

pricing.estimated_cost: Varies based on resolution and processing complexity
